list.name: Cyber Security
descriptions: Experience with CTI, SOC and DF/IR processes

list.name: Networking
descriptions: Designed and implemented networks across multiple sites
Experience with networking products from industry vendors including Fortinet, Cisco and Ubiquiti

list.name: Programming
descriptions: Proficient in Python and Arduino, familiar with C
Proficient in scripting including Powershell, cmd and bash scripts
Proficient in web technologies including PHP, HTML/CSS/JS and Next.js
Wrote telegram bots in Google AppScript and Python

list.name: Systems/Servers Administration
descriptions: Administered corporate networks of >100 systems with Active Directory
Provisioned, deployed and maintained servers for DNS, Web, VPN and other services
